If you're looking for a game you can play for a bit and enjoy, this is it. After my 1k+ hours, i'm just not having fun anymore. I recommend not investing your time in this game, and moving on. Devs genuinely do not care about what you think the game should be. Hackers run wild and dampen any fun you think youre guna have, and general toxic behavior within the community. Play for while, then drop it. Honestly, i'm done with this game and id rather go play something that i actually have fun playing.

I love this game! The reason why I love the game is because there is a great experience for all players as you can either play as a killer or as a survivor and the game mechanics are amazing. Although it would be much better if you could get one free killer of your choice when starting as some killers are great for beginners. It would also be better if it was easier to earn money for the game. It would also be cool if there was a beginner mode for the new or bad players so that they could have much more fun during the game.

An almost classic game for horror fans to have as they've added many popular horror icons to the game through DLC. The DLCs are not needed since you can still match make with DLC owners. Also the horror atmosphere and lore is really well done. The game play loop has very simple mechanics paired with a large depth of knowledge. This allows the game to feel easy to pick up, but very hard and long to master. It also makes a fun party game to play with friends. The best part is that the game has regular updates giving more committed players reasons to come back after a break such as reworks, events, and new outfits. 

The downside is that every new DLC seems to stress the creativity of the devs. With how simple the basic mechanics are, its hard for newer killers to release with interesting or standout abilities. The survivor game play also has the issue of unreliable teammates. Unless you play with friends, there is a huge lack of consistency to the quality of games. Playing solo vs playing with even 1 partner is a huge difference. Also the time required to unlock most/all perks on every character you want to play is ridiculously high, especially if you want to prestige them for the bonus cosmetics. This deters you from playing new characters (especially killers) simply because of the time investment required just to unlock their full perks.

After many years of playing Dead by Daylight there are a few things to be said that definitely make it a great game. The killers are actually well animated, despite how many game breaking bugs the game actually has. The maps while they can be way too large or small, do have good detail and you can remember parts of them to extent. Finally the player experience cap is extreme. You could be playing 2000 hours and this game will still make no sense. That said, the game breaking bugs are there, this company has somehow managed to make a killers illusion stun him, in a patch that hardly changed him in any way if at all, and I bet you anything you will get camped within 10 matches. 8/10 shoulda kept the fun bugs

You can make people mad just by queuing up as certain killers 10/10 game.

Also it goes on sale for half price every couple months perfect time to snag the dlc you'd like.

Vamo lá né.
Eu jogo e continuo jogando pq sou trouxa e tenho amigas pra passar raiva cmg pq se não eu nem abria esse jogo. Mas o client tem MUIIITOS ERROS! Além de bugs e estresses e traves in game, pra abrir o jogo é uma luta, cada dia um erro diferente. Se eu quiser jogar eu tenho que começar a tentar meia hora antes pelo menos.
Se vc não tiver amigos pra te acompanhar e também dependendo do seu PC NÃO COMPRE! Vai ser só estresse e decepção.
Ademais o jogo conta com sistemas e complexidades muito grandes que os tutoriais basicos não ensinam, vc aprende na marra e isso te faz cometer vários erros e isso te desanima, então precisa estudar e ver pessoas jogando online pra vc entender onde ta errando e onde precisa melhorar.
Ah e por fim, as tradução do jogo e a descrição das coisas é bem razoável, acaba sendo umas coisa meio confusa e difícil de aprender e entender de outra forma que não a prática.

Je ne recommanderai pas ce jeu.
Avant la mise à jour de Hellraiser, rajoutant le personnage Pinhead, le jeu avait ses problèmes, mais ils n'étaient pas mis en avant car la plupart des jeux s'amusaient et il y avait un semblant de matchmaking.
Avec cette mise à jour, les anciens rangs, allant de 1 à 20 ont été retiré par des rangs typiques de MOBA, qui enfaite ne veulent rien dire.

On ne sait pas si on joue contre des gens fort, des gens mauvais, on peut aussi bien trouver des personnes avec 3000 heures de jeu en 'Ash 4' qu'au niveau le plus haut.
Mais là n'est pas le soucis, le soucis devient que le jeu, auparavant étant réellement pour le fun, pour apprécier un peu de détente est devenu une fête du Tryhard.

Tout le monde joue les mêmes atouts, les mêmes add-ons, les mêmes objets, les mêmes tueurs les plus puissants, pour gagner. Et ça ne sert à rien de jouer autre chose. La qualité de mes parties se sont détériorées instantanément après cette mise à jour et ce changement de type de matchmaking.
Je ne souhaite tout simplement plus jouer à ce jeu, et je ne le recommande vraiment pas tant que ce système n'est pas changé.
Sans parler de tout ses autres soucis, qu'ils soient hackers, système de 'perks' qui demandent 500heures pour avoir ne serais-ce que la moitié des perks du jeu DEBLOQUE, et encore 100 autres pour les avoir toutes sur le survivant de votre choix, ou tueur de votre choix.

Les graphismes aussi semblent devenir pire en pire à chaque 'rework' de maps, on comprend pas

给差评了，一直很爱玩杀鸡，平时时间不多，一旦有闲暇就会上来玩会。

不是单边屠夫玩家，但屠夫打的比较多。

SBMM系统上线之后越发觉得这个游戏开始变得没意思了。

[b] SBMM系统就像是操纵木偶的线，每个玩家都是被幕后黑手所操纵的木偶。 [/b]

这盘4杀了？那好的，下盘给你匹配更强的人类/屠夫。人类四跑地图给你安排一下寂静岭学校、废旧车库。

最搞笑的是你的对局基本被强行50/50。

真赢一把输一把赢一把输一把就这么来回循环。就这么被操纵每局的游戏过程。

前一把人类四跑三跑，后一把马上给你安排壮丁给你爽。

段位竟然还不断的往上走，碰见红段的也是人皇一把，壮丁一把。

官方你们真觉得这样很有趣吗？

你们真觉得玩家认为这样很爽吗？我不爽啊。赢了的局人类壮丁，拿着手电不带咬根，老年钢筋吃刀下板。跟壮丁打的我直犯困。

输了的局一把4人皇，转角卡视野，拉板马拉松，平均每把3个咬根。

个个16岁钢筋，一个闲逛的都没有，开局打倒一个必亮2台机。

最厉害的是地图也能给你操纵。

最近回来玩杀鸡直接买了追猎者，好家伙自己的地图生化警局竟然一次没碰见过。我就想看看朋友吹的做的特好的警局建模。

稍微四杀两局马上板子加工厂，麦子地给你安排上。就这种地图屠夫的胜率别想超过50%给你安排的明明白白的，一张加工厂几十个板子，就算是一个只会马拉松的人类，当板皇都能轻松溜你两台机。

换个护士四杀直接给你安排进麦子地、病房。

杀鸡官方你们真的太厉害了。
